channel.title: Morning Mail
channel.description: Stay updated on the latest news and events happening in the RPI community.

item.title: CMDIS BYOND Build Your Own Nano Device Program – Applications are Open
item.description: Date: Monday, January 19, 2026 12:00 AM - 7:00 PM - Spring 2026 Applications Now Open for CMDIS BYOND Build Your Own Nano Device Program. The Center for Materials, Devices and Integrated Systems’, Micro and NanoFabrication Clean Room, offers a four-module certificate program for undergraduates, an exciting opportunity for those planning to pursue a graduate degree or those looking to prepare for a professional career in microelectronics, medical, and energy industries. Applications for the…
item.author: Students

item.title: Lean Green Belt Certification - register by 1/16 for discount
item.description: At the end of this month the Industrial Engineering Student Chapter will host the Lean Green Belt certification taught by MANE professor and Master Black Belt Dr. Ashish Ghosh! Lean Green Belt is a 3-day intensive course about Lean manufacturing, waste management, and engineering management. Any student is welcome to sign up! For a discounted price register by this Friday 1/16/26. Registration is open until the week of the course.
item.author: Students

item.title: RPI Libraries Provides New AI Tools to Boost Your Research & Instruction
item.description: The RPI community has access to ScienceDirect AI, Scopus AI, and Mendeley Reading Assistant through RPI Libraries. RPI is the first U.S. university to adopt both ScienceDirect AI and Scopus AI. Explore these new tools today!
item.author: Community

item.title: Webex Event Training Webinar on Friday January 16, 2026
item.description: Hosting a campus event or supporting a student webinar? Join a hands-on Webex Event Training Webinar, part of the MMS Collaboration Software Training series. Register now for this webinar presented via Webex on Friday January 16 from 11am-12pm: https://rensselaer.webex.com/webappng/sites/rensselaer/webinar/webinarSeries/register/783d951c6ab8482e9198a7bd6075a700 Learn the basics of Webex Event hosting, with demonstration and Q&A, along with new features recently added to the hosting platform.
item.author: Community

item.title: Faculty Spotlight Research & Impact - Prof. Underhill | Jan. 14
item.description:
Date: Wednesday, January 14, 2026 2:00 PM - 2:30 PM - Do you know how RPI Engineering faculty are shaping the future? In just 20 minutes, you’ll discover how their research is changing the world! Join us to learn how TED Talk meets research presented in PechaKucha style! Open to ALL!

For information about sharing your news or events, or to change your subscription settings, visit morningmail.rpi.edu.
item.author: Community
